fullplot: The life story of the titular Beaumarchais (Fabrice Luchini), playwright and adventurer, who gets himself into numerous different scrapes and romantic encounters in 18th Century France.
plot: The life story of the titular Beaumarchais (Fabrice Luchini), playwright and adventurer, who gets himself into numerous different scrapes and romantic encounters in 18th Century France.
title: Beaumarchais the Scoundrel
writers: Sacha Guitry (inspired: Librement inspirè de l'oeuvre inèdite de)
